links.description: A developer who loves building cool things with code. Find me elsewhere @thibaultmorizet

home.presentation: Hi, I'm Thibault Morizet, a developer who loves building cool things with code.

about.first: Passionate about software architecture and web development, I enjoy designing efficient and elegant solutions. My expertise spans both front-end and back-end, with a strong focus on modern technologies and dynamic environments.
about.second: Outside of coding, I invest time in sports and continuously nurture my curiosity through reading and learning.

work.title: years of experience in development
work.description: My journey has taken me from agile startups to established companies, where I had the opportunity to work on large-scale projects.

projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.
projects.contactStart: Need more details about the project or interested in working together? Contact me directly via
